Stilla Technologies 通过与 Avantor 的战略分销关系扩大美国业务，并推出先进的内容产品Stilla 是基因组学和数字 PCR 领域的先驱，很高兴地宣布通过与生命科学和先进技术解决方案领域的全球领导者 Avantor 建立战略分销关系，在美国进行扩张。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Stilla-Technologies-expands-US-Presence-through-strategic-distribution-relationship-with-Avantor-and-introduces-advanced-content-offerings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Stilla-Technologies-expands-US-Presence-through-strategic-distribution-relationship-with-Avantor-and-introduces-advanced-content-offerings.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67b7d6bb-a646-45ab-9802-956e906769ce Thu, 20 Jun 2024 05:06:00 -0400 Stilla Technologies expands U.S. presence through strategic distribution relationship with Avantor and introduces advanced content offerings

聚类分析确定妊娠期糖尿病患者的不同亚组妊娠糖尿病患者表现出不同的疾病进展，因此需要个性化的治疗措施。由维也纳医科大学领导的一个国际研究小组现已确定了该疾病的三个亚组，具有不同的治疗需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Cluster-analysis-identizes-distinct-subgroups-of-gestational-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Cluster-analysis-identizes-distinct-subgroups-of-gestational-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=929a7907-2760-46c4-b8f6-9fe6d17f220e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 14:16:00 -0400 Cluster analysis identifies distinct subgroups of gestational diabetes patients
